title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.10 - Accrue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.10 - Accrue

State Regulations

To give effect to an accrual; to record revenue or
expense in the reporting period to which it relates, notwithstanding that the
required receipt or outlay may take place, in whole or in part, in a preceding
or following accounting period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
